What is the formula for correction to latitude by Bowditchʹs method?
options: \( =\text { Total error in latitude } \times \text { (Length of that traverse line) / (Total length of traverse) } \)
\( =\text { Total error in departure } \times \text { (Length of that traverse line) / (Total length of traverse) } \)
\( =\text { Total error in latitude } \times \text { ( latitude of that traverse line) / (Arithmetic sum of latitude) } \)
\( =\text { Total error in departure } x \text { (departure of that traverse line) / (Arithmetic sum of latitude) }\)
quizWrap.answer: \( =\text { Total error in latitude } \times \text { (Length of that traverse line) / (Total length of traverse) } \)
